"Its abdominal plating came off.": "Depending on the enemy, you may be able to break off certain parts of its body. Always look for potential vulnerabilities you can exploit."
"Destroying certain body parts brings many advantages in battle, from exposing weak points to hindering range of motion."
"Oh, so if we break this one's abdominal plating... will it have a weak point there too?"
"Yeah, same thing with the Gororon. The core hidden on its abdomen will be a weak point."
